data.title: Disaster Movie “2012” Starring John Cusack DVD Widescreen FACTORY SEALED! NEW! 43396275171
data.meta_description:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of 2012, the disaster movie that promises to keep you on the edge of your seat. Starring John Cusack and directed by Roland Emmerich, this DVD is a must-have for fans of action and adventure. The widescreen format allows for an immersive viewing experience that will make you feel like you're right in the middle of the action.


This brand-new, factory-sealed DVD is the perfect addition to any movie collection. With a PG-13 rating and a science-fiction sub-genre, 2012 is a movie that the whole family can enjoy. Don't miss out on the chance to own this exciting movie and experience the end of the world like never before.
